last_episode_to_air.name: In America We're Brave
last_episode_to_air.overview: After becoming the target of gossiping cousins back in Santo Domingo, the Castellis set out to prove they’re thriving in Miami.

name: Gordita Chronicles
overview: A Latina reporter looks back on her childhood as a chubby, willful and reluctant Dominican immigrant growing up with her eccentric family in 1980s Miami.
tagline: The American dream... pero not quite.

episodes.name: In America Everything Is Possible
episodes.overview: After leaving the Dominican Republic to start anew in Miami, the Castelli family attempts to fit in, make friends, and thrive in a place where the American Dream isn't as dreamy as they imagined.

episodes.name: In America We Speak English
episodes.overview: Cucu finds herself in hot water for speaking Spanish and then English. Víctor and Adela struggle to make good first impressions, while Emilia finds herself in the crosshairs of the most popular girls in school.

episodes.name: In America No One Likes a Chicken
episodes.overview: Cucu tries to kick-start puberty, Adela gets pulled over for not driving "the American way," and Emilia accidentally agrees to see a horror movie on opening night with the Bubblegum Girls.

episodes.name: In America We Sleepover
episodes.overview: The Castellis experience a slew of American firsts: Cucu’s first sleepover, Víctor's first American business dinner, and Emilia's first babysitting job.

episodes.name: In America We Trick or Treat
episodes.overview: The Castellis endure a tricky first Halloween when Cucu's Dominican grandmother arrives. Emilia makes a horrifying discovery in the boys' bathroom, and the Bubblegums help her get some brujería revenge.

episodes.name: In America We Play to Win
episodes.overview: The Castellis engage in cutthroat competitions at school, work, home, and an all-American pool party.

episodes.name: In America We Stereotype
episodes.overview: When his boss incorrectly assumes he’s great at baseball, Víctor attempts to transform himself into the "Santo Domingo Slugger" with Adela's help. Cucu defies gender stereotypes by signing up for shop class, while Emilia finds a new niche.

episodes.name: In America You Get What You Pay For
episodes.overview: Cucu borrows money from an unlikely loan shark, Adela becomes the coupon queen of Miami, and Víctor and Emilia take on a shady used car salesman.

episodes.name: In America We Fall in Love
episodes.overview: Love is not in the air as Adela and Víctor attempt to celebrate their anniversary, and Cucu must rescind an offer to the dance. Meanwhile, a rhythmless Emilia must perform a series of complex dance moves at her frenemy's quinceañera.

episodes.name: In America We're Brave
episodes.overview: After becoming the target of gossiping cousins back in Santo Domingo, the Castellis set out to prove they’re thriving in Miami.
